title: If you were to compare the music of Indonesia to the Philippines, what are the similarities and differences? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both are into mellow and soul. Filipino music, for me, is closer to Western music especially Filipino Hip-Hop music. Filipino Hip-Hop musicians are slowly adapting to American Hip-Hop music especially with the new mumble rap. Generally, both Indonesian and Filipino music are similar to each other and language is the only one being different. Both are modern.

Surprisingly, it's quite similar than most people expected and sometimes they only giveaway that this isn't indonesia music is i can't understand it, even though the sound familiar. I give or take we are step ahead few years
